data.eml:eml: The genus Danielithosia Dubatolov & Kishida, 2012 (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae) in Cambodia, with description of one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bayarsaikhan, Ulziijargal, Dubatolov, Vladimir V., Bae, Yang-Seop (2015): The genus Danielithosia Dubatolov & Kishida, 2012 (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae) in Cambodia, with description of one new species. Zootaxa 3964 (4): 494-497, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3964.4.9
